recipe.title: Beef Parmesan with Garlic Angel Hair Pasta

preparation.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

recipe.comment: Make the meat ahead of time, and refrigerate over night, the acid in the tomato sauce will tenderize the meat even more. If you do this, save the mozzarella till the last minute.
